verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: fired] off [ARG1: a barrage of angry tweets] [ARGM-TMP: early Sunday morning] , [ARGM-ADV: directing much of his ire at the the former head of the FBI , whom he called " the WORST FBI Director in history , by far] ! "

[ARG0: President Donald Trump] fired off a barrage of angry tweets early Sunday morning , [V: directing] [ARG1: much of his ire] [ARG2: at the the former head of the FBI , whom he called " the WORST FBI Director in history , by far] ! "

President Donald Trump fired off a barrage of angry tweets early Sunday morning , directing much of his ire at [ARG1: the the former head of the FBI] , [R-ARG1: whom] [ARG0: he] [V: called] [ARG2: " the WORST FBI Director in history] , [ARGM-TMP: by far] ! "
